scheme_name: Educational Award Scheme - Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
description: The Educational Award Scheme by the Gujarat Labour Welfare Board provides financial assistance to the children of workers registered with the board to support their education from primary to higher secondary levels. The scheme aims to encourage education among workersâ€™ families by offering monetary awards to meritorious students.
key_features: Financial awards for children of registered workers
Covers students from primary to higher secondary education
Implemented by Gujarat Labour Welfare Board

benefits.award_amount: Varies based on academic level and performance
benefits.coverage: One-time financial award for meritorious students

education_criteria: Students studying in primary, secondary, or higher secondary classes
Must have secured high marks in the previous academic year
additional_criteria: Parent must be a registered worker with Gujarat Labour Welfare Board
Must be a resident of Gujarat
eligibility.admission_requirement: Enrolled in recognized schools in Gujarat
institution_criteria: Government or recognized private schools in Gujarat

steps: Obtain application form from Gujarat Labour Welfare Board office
Fill and submit the form with required documents
application_process.note: Submit applications within the academic year deadline

special_notes: Award amount depends on academic performance and level of education
Limited to children of registered workers
Applications must be renewed annually for continued eligibility
